summary: ENGINE PROBLEMS SINCE OWNING CAR. CAR CRANKS BUT WON'T START.  HAS HAPPENED TOO MANY TIMES TO COUNT SINCE I'VE OWNED THE CAR.  THE INCIDENT DATE I CHOSE WAS THE FIRST TIME IT HAPPENED.    IT HAPPENED THE FIRST TIME 2 MONTHS AFTER A RECALL REPAIR HAD BEEN DONE AND HAS CONTINUED UNTIL TODAY. THE VEHICLE COMPONENT I CHOSE IS A GUESS SINCE THE PROBLEM HAS NEVER BEEN DETERMINED.  MANY THINGS HAVE BEEN REPLACED BUT THE PROBLEM PERSISTS.
